channel.title: Growth System (Tekst Based)
channel.description:
I was thinking of this i can easely code it so i want your VOTE! :
The TotalDamage you hit on every monster gets calculated The TotalMonster kills you make gets calculated The TotalPlayer kills you make gets calculated
These 3 lines of special codes get combined into 1 growth
for example a player whit more playerkills then monsterkills
will be Called a Killer show like [KILLER]
we can see other players growth when they use ::yell or ::local (a special command of my server)
WOULD YOU LIKE THIS !? ADD IT IN MY SERVER YES OR NO ?! IF YES DO U KNOW ANY SPECIAL TITLES YOU WOULD LIKE ?
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2007, 07:05:04 PM[/size][hr]FUCKING ANSER WHEN U READ LAZY FUCKERS!

item.title: Growth System (Tekst Based)
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

Palidino76:

I think you should explain it alittle more first

Based on the Damage you have done on monsters
+
Based on the Amount of monsters Killed
+
Based on the Amount of players Killed

Calculation of these 3 things will come out in 1 player title

some examples

minor damage+minor kill+none/low player kills = [WARRIOR]
playerkilss > monsterkills = [KILLER]
low are no damage+no kill = [ROOKIE]

etc…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2007, 08:38:13 PM[/size][hr]anybody ?

Read full topic
